text: A bronze statue of composer George M. Cohan, by artist Georg John Lober and architect Otto Langman, is installed at Duffy Square in Manhattan, New York. Cast in 1959 and dedicated on September 11, 1959, the statue rests on a light Barre granite pedestal, which is set on a dark Barre granite base. ==See also== * 1959 in art ==References== ==External links== * Category:1959 establishments in New York (state) Category:1959 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Manhattan Category:Granite sculptures in New York City Category:Monuments and memorials in Manhattan Category:Outdoor sculptures in Manhattan Category:Sculptures of men in New York City Category:Statues in New York City Category:Times Square
title: Statue of George M. Cohan
